short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy comments from a Doc or Slides presentation to each student copy that has been created in classroom

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When attaching a file from Drive to a Classroom assignment, you have the ability to "Make a copy for each student". However, any comments on those files will be removed when the copies are made. 

This extension will search through any Docs or Slides attachments and copy the comments from your original to the student copies. This can be really useful for giving more detailed instructions alongside your template Doc or Slides without interfering with the workspace or final result.

All comments appear with your name at the time the copies are made.
